text: Jon krunavundiŋ kukuyɨ mɨŋaŋgɨrundi vana ha pañɨndu mɨŋami. Kandɨha Gotɨndu pɨhuyɨndu vana vaha, mana krundu vana taya vaha, vami. Kamavahi nurɨŋambi masamasa ambamu, Ara Gotɨndu pɨhuyɨndu vana vɨtɨrɨŋ arɨŋ nɨmavamba kitɨwɨrɨmandɨ, Ara mumɨndɨhi nuŋambirɨm maŋindarɨmaŋgarandara, vamba ambɨrɨmandɨ.
